skill.name: run-tests
skill.description: Run unit and integration tests for Catalyst-Relay. Use when asked to test, run tests, verify changes, or check if code works.
skill.summary: Run unit and integration tests for Catalyst-Relay. Use when asked to test, run tests, verify changes...
skill.author: Artisan-Edge

security_audit.summary: All 41 static findings are false positives. The skill is a legitimate test runner for Catalyst-Relay. Scanner misinterpreted markdown code fences as shell backticks, documentation examples as dynamic imports, and SHA256 hashes as weak cryptographic algorithms. Integration tests require explicit user consent and manual password entry.

content.value_statement: Developers working with Catalyst-Relay need to verify their code changes work correctly. This skill runs unit tests with bun test and guides users through SAP integration tests with proper credential handling.
actual_capabilities: Run all unit tests with bun test command
Run tests in watch mode for development
Run specific test directories or files
Verify Node.js compatibility with TypeScript imports
Guide through SAP integration tests with credential prompts
Read and display test results from test.output file
limitations: Only works within Catalyst-Relay project directory
Integration tests require manual SAP credential entry by user
Does not automatically configure environment variables
Requires bun runtime to be installed

best_practices: Run tests before committing to catch regressions early
Use watch mode during active development for rapid feedback
Verify Node.js compatibility with the import check before publishing
Keep integration test credentials separate and never commit to version control
anti_patterns: Running integration tests without verifying credentials are set correctly
Skipping tests to save time before pushing changes
Running all tests when only one module was modified
Ignoring test failures and proceeding with development

faq.question: How do I run all unit tests?
faq.answer: Simply ask to run the tests. The skill will execute bun test to run all unit tests in the project.

faq.question: Can I run tests for a specific directory?
faq.answer: Yes. Specify the directory path like src/__tests__/core and the skill will run tests for that location only.

faq.question: What credentials are needed for integration tests?
faq.answer: Integration tests require SAP_TEST_ADT_URL, SAP_TEST_CLIENT, SAP_TEST_USERNAME, and SAP_PASSWORD. See .env.templ for the template.

faq.question: How do I run tests in watch mode?
faq.answer: Ask to run tests in watch mode. The skill will execute bun test --watch which reruns tests on file changes.

faq.question: What does the Node.js compatibility check do?
faq.answer: It verifies that TypeScript/ESM imports work correctly in Node.js using the experimental strip-types flag.

faq.question: Where are test results stored?
faq.answer: Unit test results display directly. Integration test results are read from the test.output file after the test.bat script completes.
